title: Short-term hospital readmissions for gun injuries cost $86 million a year

title_detail.value: Short-term hospital readmissions for gun injuries cost $86 million a year

summary: Hospital readmissions of patients within six months of suffering a firearm injury cost taxpayers, private insurers and uninsured families an average of $86 million a year from 2010 through 2015, according to new estimates.

summary_detail.value: Hospital readmissions of patients within six months of suffering a firearm injury cost taxpayers, private insurers and uninsured families an average of $86 million a year from 2010 through 2015, according to new estimates.
